content: Hi! We have a group of people meeting this semester in Montreal to learn lean together. What would you suggest as a good channel/topic/etc. for us to communicate with each other?
Sure, there's "geographic locality", but we're looking for something more like a seminar/conference/etc. channel
If you want to learn lean by working on a specific project together then you can just chat about it in #mathlib4 (and others will join in). But there's also the option of having your own channel.
Ah! In that case, could one of the admins create a channel (something like "Lean at Lacim 2026") for us, please? I don't have enough permissions myself

For cross-referencing purposes, I should mention that the channel now exists! :tada:
See: #Zulip meta > Montreal learning group
